ingredients.ingredient: 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Lightly steam cauliflower florets first so they're tender but not mushy
Mix cheese and cream together, pour over cauliflower, and bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes until bubbly
